name: Starry Grace
description: Your quick and free starknife motions allow you to make deadly dexterous attacks.
benefit: When wielding a starknife, you can add your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier to that weaponâ€™s damage. The starknife must be one appropriate for your size. You do not gain this benefit while fighting with two weapons or using flurry of blows, or any time another hand is otherwise occupied.
